trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control deletes the record.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollere hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>-hendelse når en Slett-knapp (en knapp med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Delete") i kontrollen klikkes, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen sletter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of a delete operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel kontrollere resultatet av en sletting når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A GridViewDeletedEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: En GridViewDeletedEventArgs-objekt er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gjør det mulig å fastsette antall poster som er berørt og eventuelle unntak som kan ha oppstått.

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of records affected by the delete operation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å fastsette antall poster som er berørt av sletteoperasjonen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to determine whether any exceptions occurred.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>til å fastslå om unntak oppstod.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi om unntaket ble behandlet i hendelseshåndtering metoden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an exception occurs during the delete operation and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control re-throws the exception.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis det oppstår et unntak under sletteoperasjonen og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>er satt til `false`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll på nytt oppstår unntaket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to access the name/value pairs of the key fields and non-key fields of the deleted record, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til navn/verdi-par med feltene nøkkelfelt og ikke er en nøkkel i slettet post, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>|The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>|The <xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> object contained in the `e` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>|Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>| Verdien for den `affectedRows` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>| <xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName>-Objekt i den `e` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>| Initialisert til `false`. | > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere ved å heve hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> </xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som er berørt av sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that represents the exception raised when the delete operation was performed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Exception>som representerer det oppstod et unntaket under sletteoperasjonen ble utført.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: If no exception is raised, use <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen unntak oppstår, kan du bruke <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> for denne parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows affected by the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter hvor mange rader som er berørt av sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Use the AffectedRows property to determine the number of records affected by the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Bruk AffectedRows-egenskapen til å bestemme antall poster som er berørt av sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to verify that the correct number of records was deleted in the following situations: - Verify that only a single record was deleted.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis til å bekrefte at riktig antall poster som ble slettet i følgende situasjoner:-Kontroller at bare én post ble slettet.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes an improperly written delete statement can delete multiple records.
trans-unit.target: Noen ganger kan en feilaktig skriftlig delete-setning slette flere poster.

trans-unit.source: - Verify that a record was deleted when an error occurs during the delete operation that does not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: -Kontroller at en post ble slettet når det oppstår en feil under sletteoperasjonen som ikke utløse et unntak.

trans-unit.source: - Verify that a record was deleted when a data source control that supports optimistic concurrency (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controls) has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: -Kontroller at en post ble slettet når en kilde-kontroll for data som støtter Optimistisk samtidighet (slik som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>Kontroller) er den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>-egenskapen satt til den `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` opplistingsverdien.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Under this setting, a record that has been modified by another user concurrently might not be deleted.
trans-unit.target: En oppføring som har blitt endret av en annen bruker samtidig kan ikke slettes under denne innstillingen.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som er berørt av sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter unntaket (Hvis noen) som oppstod under sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Exception property to determine the exception that was raised during the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Bruk unntak-egenskapen til å fastslå unntak oppstod under sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen unntak oppstod, denne egenskapen returnerer `null`.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control re-throws the exception.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis det oppstod et unntak, og du vil behandle unntak i hendelsesbehandlingen, må du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>egenskapen `true`; ellers den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll på nytt oppstår unntaket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that represents the exception that was raised during the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Exception>som representerer unntak oppstod under sletteoperasjonen.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the delete operation was handled in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om et unntak som oppstod under sletteoperasjonen ble behandlet i behandlingsprogram.

trans-unit.source: When an exception is raised during the delete operation, use the ExceptionHandled property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen ExceptionHandled som viser om unntaket ble behandlet i behandlingsprogrammet når det oppstår et unntak under sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, unntaket regnes håndtert og ikke er et på nytt.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control re-throws the exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen settes til `false`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll på nytt oppstår unntaket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To determine which exception was raised, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå hvilke unntak oppstod i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis unntaket ble behandlet i behandlingsprogrammet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an ordered dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.
trans-unit.target: Henter en bestilte ordliste for nøkkelfeltet navn/verdi-par for slettet post.

trans-unit.source: Use the Keys property to access the values of the key fields (as specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property) for a deleted record.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen nøkler til å få tilgang til verdiene i nøkkelfeltene (som angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen) for en slettet oppføring.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted records.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke disse verdiene for å loggføre slettede poster.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property contains only the key fields.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Inneholder bare nøkkelfeltene for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: To access the non-key fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til feltene ikke er en nøkkel, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Keys property returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen nøkler returnerer et objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the key fields of the deleted record.
trans-unit.target: Objektet inneholder <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>objekter som representerer nøkkelfeltene for slettet oppføringen.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> that contains an ordered dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> som inneholder en bestilte ordliste for nøkkelfeltet navn/verdi-par for slettet post.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.
trans-unit.target: Henter en ordliste for ikke-nøkkelfelt navn/verdi-par for slettet post.

trans-unit.source: Use the Values property to access the values of the non-key fields for a deleted record.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen verdier for å få tilgang til verdiene i feltene ikke er en nøkkel for en slettet post.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted records.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke disse verdiene for å loggføre slettede poster.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Values property is populated only when two-way binding expressions are used in the item template.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For verdier er fylt ut bare ved bruk av toveis binding uttrykk i malen elementet.

trans-unit.source: For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon på toveis binding uttrykk [Binding til databaser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).

trans-unit.source: The Values property returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen verdier returnerer et objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the non-key fields of the deleted record.
trans-unit.target: Objektet inneholder <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>objekter som representerer feltene ikke er en nøkkel for slettet oppføring.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property does not contain the key fields (as specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property) for the deleted record.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Egenskapen inneholder ikke nøkkelfeltene (som angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen) før slettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: To access the key fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til nøkkelfeltene, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> that contains a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> som inneholder en liste over ikke-nøkkelfelt navn/verdi-par for slettet post.
